original_title: Debbie Rochon Confidential: My Years in Tromaville Exposed!
overview: The scream queen Debbie Rochon is also the queen of independent cinema and has appeared in more films than all the Ellen Pages and Parker Poseys put together. From her start as a Tromette alongside Troma founder and creater of The Toxic Avenger, Lloyd Kaufman, to her starring roles in some of Troma's greatest films duch as Tromeo & Juliet and Terror Firmer, Debbie Rochon has endeared herself to film fanatics around the world.
title: Debbie Rochon Confidential: My Years in Tromaville Exposed!
